r-about.description-bernardino: If we knew what it was we were doing, it would not be called research, would it?
r-about.description-igor: In a near future, if you don't know how to program, you will be programmed yourself.
r-about.description-lucas: If you don't have a plan, you become part of somebody else's plan.
r-about.p1: This application is a project developed by two students/friends/roommates, for the Undergraduate Course Completion Work. The idea arose from the need on the part of the institution, for a solution that centralized the process of registration and submission of extension actions.
r-about.p2: We are undergraduate students in Software Engineering at the Federal University of Pampa. We are in the final stretch of the course, currently in the 7th regular semester, of 9 semesters. We were both born in Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil, and in addition to college, we work fully as Fullstack Developers at
